metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3209 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The ldns-keygen tool in ldns 1.6.x uses the current umask to set the privileges of the private key, which might allow local users to obtain the private key by reading the file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3209` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldnsutils - 1.6.17-8
libldns1 - 1.6.17-8
python-ldns - 1.6.17-8
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> ldns-keygen is in the ldnsutils package in universe

criterions.comment: ldns package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.17-8').
